FuncDef:
The ospf peer hold-max-cost timer command sets a period during which OSPF keeps the maximum cost in local LSAs.
The undo ospf peer hold-max-cost timer command restores the default configuration. The ospf peer hold-max-cost timer command sets a period during which OSPF keeps the maximum cost in local LSAs. The undo ospf peer hold-max-cost timer command restores the default configuration. By default, no such a period is set after an OSPF neighbor relationship is established.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a period during which OSPFv3 keeps the maximum cost in local LSAs.
The value is an integer ranging from 100 to 1000000, in milliseconds.
